gameRecap.title: Game Recap: Suns 133, Hornets 119
gameRecap.excerpt: The Suns defeated the Hornets 133-119. Devin Booker led Phoenix with 35 points, four rebounds, and seven assists as Jusuf Nurkic (24 points, 15 rebounds), Kevin Durant (21 points, 11 assists), and Eric Gordon (21 points, seven 3PTs) totaled 66 points. Terry Rozier led the Hornets with 42 points (8-12 3PT) and eight assists as Brandon Miller totaled 20 points. The Suns improve to 16-15 on the year as the Hornets move to 7-23.
